sentences.english: Finland invested in communications and IT at exactly the right time.
sentences.chinese: 芬蘭在通訊和信息技術方面的投資可謂恰逢其時。

sentences.english: These antennas are commonly used at earth-based stations in satellite communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 這種螺旋天線常用於無形通訊系統中的地面臺站。

sentences.english: USB is an interface standard of computer's external devices.
sentences.chinese: USB是一種計算機外圍串行通訊接口標準。

sentences.english: Midcom is the world's top producer of telecommunications transformers.
sentences.chinese: 明康是世界級的通訊變壓器生產商。

sentences.english: In computer communications, the pseudo - random code technique is used for recognition.
sentences.chinese: 在計算機通訊中，可採用僞隨機碼技術來進行識別。

sentences.english: Communication with France was difficult during the telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 電信與郵政部門罷工期間，與法國通訊聯繫很困難。

sentences.english: All correspondence will be made via email only.
sentences.chinese: 所有通訊將以電郵方式進行。

sentences.english: Cell phone service was not interrupted outside BART stations.
sentences.chinese: 在站外，手機通訊服務沒有中斷。

sentences.english: No e-mail newsletters clutter your mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 沒有塞滿您郵箱的電子郵件時事通訊。

sentences.english: You can get your newsletters or bills over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在那裏瀏覽時事通訊或賬單。

sentences.english: Instant communication is Chinese Internet most one of all-pervading network application.
sentences.chinese: 即時通訊是中國互聯網最爲普及的網絡應用之一。

sentences.english: Ane-mail address of the organization responsible for correspondence related to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 有關展覽的電子郵件通訊地址的組織工作。

sentences.english: R10 serial or parallel LCD decision means of communication.
sentences.chinese: R10決定液晶的串行或者並行通訊方式。

sentences.english: He proposed half a dozen accords in such areas as culture, post and communications.
sentences.chinese: 郵電和通訊領域提出了六項建議。

sentences.english: The research is reported in Biochemical and Biophysical Research Communications.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究被刊登在《生化與生理研究通訊》上。

sentences.english: Nonlinear optical(NLO) materials will play a key role in future optical communication.
sentences.chinese: 非線性光學材料是未來光通訊的關鍵材料。
